item.title: Wolverine 1s Smashed by 2s
item.author: Steve Ndumbe,
item.description: On Sunday 13th January, the Wolverines set off for Essex with 3 teams ready to hit their first tournament of 2013 in force. In a first in the club’s history, there were no delays in setting off, nor incidents on the way there (minus Scott Esnouf’s typical minibus stalling, mind). The day started off …
